com.viaoa.web

Class OATextArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.web.OATextField
      • com.viaoa.web.OATextArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OAJspComponent, OAJspRequirementsInterface, OATableEditor, ComponentInterface, Serializable

    public class OATextArea
extends OATextField
    TextArea component that can bind html textarea to OA.
    Author:
    vvia
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
